short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you track your social activity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fist Bump makes LinkedIn easy and fun.

It is an AI Connection and Task manager tool that leads you through daily engagement tasks, while automatically tracking your progress and next step with hundreds of prospects.

Make Engagement Lists
Add Prospects with ONE click
Follow Up Sales Message Workflows
AI Comment Suggestions with your voice
AI Connection Message Recommendations
Curated Feeds To See Posts Natively in LinkedIn
Track Engagements in our Platform or Sync to CRM

The tool also includes AI post creation in your own voice.

Use your existing post to make more engaging and connections and sales on LinkedIn
